Token.Abstract: Provides functions expected to be in the applications AppDelegate class.
Disables the App URL Cache (if applicable).
Sets a flag to disable the use of a NSIncrementalStore (if applicable).

Parameter.Name: flagValue
Parameter.Abstract: A BOOL flag to specify whether or not to bypass using a NSIncrementalStore when initializing the App's CoreData NSPersistentStore.

Token.Abstract: Sets a string prefix to be used when opening and creating CoreData NSPersistentStore.

Parameter.Name: prefix
Parameter.Abstract: A NSString prefix to be prepended to any NSPersistentStore URLs.

Token.Abstract: Creates or (if already created) returns the App's default NSManagedObjectContext.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The App's default NSManagedObjectContext object, creating it if needed.

Token.Abstract: Creates or (if already created) returns the App's default NSManagedObjectModel.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The App's default NSManagedObjectModel object, creating it if needed.

Token.Abstract: Closes the App's current NSPersistentStore, then removes the file from the device.
Flushes any cached updates from the current NSManagedObjectContext to the NSPersistentStore.
Loads and returns the current value of the user setting, specified by a key.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The NSString key for the specific user setting.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current value of the specified user setting (or @"" if not set).

Token.Abstract: Loads and returns the current value of the user setting, specified by a key and a default value.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The NSString key for the specific user setting.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The default value for the specific user setting, when it has not been previously set.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current value of the specified user setting.

Token.Abstract: Loads and returns the current BOOL value of the user setting, specified by a key and a default value.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The NSString key for the specific user setting.

Parameter.Name: defaultValue
Parameter.Abstract: The default BOOL value for the specific user setting, when it has not been previously set.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The current value of the specified user setting.

Token.Abstract: Sets the value of the user setting, specified by a key.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The NSString key for the specific user setting.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The new value for the specific user setting.

Token.Abstract: Sets the BOOL value of the user setting, specified by a key.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: The NSString key for the specific user setting.

Parameter.Name: value
Parameter.Abstract: The new BOOL value for the specific user setting.
